question: My 81 year old father just got results back in the mail from an MRI.  It stated he had a normal MRI but then when on to say it showed mild chronic microvasular ischemic disease constant with H. What is chronic microvascular ischemic disease constant with H ?  He does have diabetes but keeps it in control.   Treatments?   Symptoms?  Will this gradually worsen until it is Dementia?
title: chronic microvascular ischemic disease constant with H
